summary: The Department of Veterans Affairs operates 300 Vet Centers in the U.S. that provide counseling services to eligible veterans, servicemembers, and their families. We testified that VA has taken some steps to address the 4 recommendations from our 2020 report related to Vet Center counselor productivity and staffing. For example, VA plans to field a counselor feedback survey in February 2022, which could inform the...
title: VA Vet Centers: Continued Attention to GAO Recommendations Could Help Meet Veteran and Servicemember Needs
